text: Prestige Consumer Healthcare is an American company. It markets and distributes over-the-counter healthcare and household cleaning products. It was formed by the merger of Medtech Products, Inc., Prestige Brands International, and the Spic and Span Company in 1996. It is headquartered in Tarrytown, New York and operates a manufacturing facility in Lynchburg, Virginia. Category:Pharmaceutical companies of the United States Category:1996 establishments in the United States
title: Prestige Consumer Healthcare
